programme.desc: In seeking to avenge his six comrades' murders, a swordsman must battle against Qiao Qing Monastery's notorious monks.

programme.title: Return of the Phoenix
programme.desc: In this masterpiece from Li Han Hsiang, sparks fly when minister Cheng Pu decides to marry off his youngest daughter before his eldest one.

programme.title: Sons of Good Earth
programme.desc: This multiple award-winning film is King Hu's first solo production, a tale of the Sino-Japanese War that ends in artistic and emotional triumph.

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: After an inn-keeper's daughter witnesses a perverted rape, her true love must rescue her from the greater danger that threatens.

programme.title: The Protectors

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West

programme.title: The Black Tavern

programme.title: Heaven and Hell

programme.title: Needing You

programme.title: Namiya

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
